heading: Presentation
text: Since 2014, ALP has invested in more than 25 innovative companies located on all continents and completed 7 exits, including 2 IPOs. Its unique positioning attracts innovative entrepreneurs who already have a POC and generate revenue, eager to accelerate their growth and enter new markets. ALP accompanies them free of charge and without time limit.

heading: The ALP formula
text: Thanks to the experience of our employees and partners, we intervene on the following topics in order to increase the chances of success of the companies in our portfolio: development strategy, search for investors, marketing, internationalization and governance. Our secret, to provide our entrepreneurs with all the resources of our consulting activity to help them in these areas.
